Header.title: Bengaluru AI Summit
Header.paragraph: A pulsating community of web3 builders in Bangalore, and spreading across other cities in India.

About.paragraph: We are on a mission to galvanise the DeFi space, to make India a Global DeFi Hub, and a destination for talent exchange. We host regular weekly Meetups and community activities in and around Bangalore, and will be hosting DeFi workshops all over India to educate the masses. We are a web3 native, with unique create-to-earn opportunities for all our members. Members will get to learn every web3 primitive, and work with other degens leading the space. We also aim to kickstart a defidegen DAO for building on web3. We welcome degens from every field, in every skill level. Come feel the MAGIC of DeFi!

Agenda.name: Morning
events: 8:00 AM – 9:00 AM: Registration & Networking Breakfast, Attendees check in, collect event badges
9:00 AM – 9:15 AM: Opening Remarks – Speaker: [Event Host/Organization Leader] – Introduction to the event, the fusion of Web3 with AI.
9:15 AM – 10:00 AM: Keynote: AI-Driven Web3: Building Smarter Decentralized Systems
10:00 AM – 10:45 AM: Panel Discussion: DeFi Meets AI: Automating Financial Ecosystems
11:00 AM – 12:00 PM: Workshop: AI-Powered NFTs: Revolutionizing Digital Art and Ownership

Agenda.name: Afternoon
events: 12:00 PM – 1:30 PM: Lunch Break & Innovation Showcase
1:30 PM – 2:15 PM: Fireside Chat: Web3 Meets Generative AI
2:15 PM – 3:00 PM: Panel: Regenerative Finance (ReFi) and AI

Agenda.name: Evening
events: 3:15 PM – 4:00 PM: Presentation: Cross-Chain AI Solutions: Enhancing Blockchain Interoperability
4:00 PM – 4:45 PM: Roundtable: AI Ethics in Decentralized Systems: Data Privacy, Autonomy, and Governance
4:45 PM – 5:30 PM: Pitch Competition: AI-Powered Web3 Startups
5:30 PM – 6:00 PM: Closing Remarks & Awards Ceremony
